website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a larger set of airtight storage containers will find their match in this clear set.
pros: Smaller containers store inside larger containers to save space
Safe for microwave, freezer, fridge, and oven up to 450°F
cons: Some people have trouble fitting the lids to storage containers

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these. The glass will shatter, only a matter of time.
customer_reviews.text: The nightmare happened. They began to crack and pieces of glass were everywhere. Thank God they did not get into my food. I believe I've had these for about 5 or 6 months. Had to throw them all away. I would NOT recommend these glass storage containers at all. What a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Seal comes off, but I don't mind that
customer_reviews.text: This containers are perfect for me. At first I was annoyed when the blue rubber seal stuck to the container rather than the lid (which can make for a mess if you have something saucey). But I actually appreciate when it comes to cleaning and sterilizing. Because the seal comes out, you can make sure all the sauce, juice, or salad dressing is cleaned out and will not taint the next thing you put in there. Overall, great value for the price. It was professionally wrapped in a branded box that arrived in an Amazon box. I was not paid or compensated for this review - products were bought by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only had decided for a few months and all of the glass pieces are chipped and we’re very careful with our staff and other glass Tupperware products we have had not had issues like this. One day I was eating and I ...
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. I’ve only had decided for a few months and all of the glass pieces are chipped and we’re very careful with our staff and other glass Tupperware products we have had not had issues like this. One day I was eating and I almost chewed on a big chuck of glass that had broken off from the glass and was in my food. Scared the hell of out me and I’ve found more pieces of glass in the Tupperware that keep getting chipped. This stuff must be super cheaply made and I’m throwing it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Trinh

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS!! - I almost ate glass.
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION. I bought these 3 weeks ago and have only used them a couple of times. I kept them in the drawer nestled in each other as they arrived in the shipping. Today. I found a shard of glass in my food, and it came from the edge of the dish. These were never handled roughly at all and have only been washed about twice. The edge underneath is weak and crumbles leaving ground glass in other containers and the drawer. I'm struggling to remember if I've ever served anything to the kids out of them. I bought glass to get away from plastics but am now going back to plastic.
customer_reviews.author: NJ home

customer_reviews.title: Covers don’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: I do not do many reviews. But I thought people should know that this glass Tupperware is really bad. The glass is good quality, but the covers do not fit on the glass! It is impossible to get all the sides to clip on! I usually just use Saran Wrap because I can’t get the covers on! I’m constantly fighting to get the covers on. I am soooo disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Edit On Original Post
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: This company is AMAZING! I originally reviewed this a 3 star but am changing it to 5 due to the outstanding customer service! My original review with 3 stars was "I like the sizes and also how they seal but the first day using them for meal prep one of the lids broke." I received an email stating they are sending me a replacement. WHAT?!? I didn't even ask for it, that is some awesome proactive customer service. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for great storage or meal prep containers. I am loving mine!
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle Finley

customer_reviews.title: Becareful it will chip
customer_reviews.text: Very excited when I recieved this, and thought it would have been a great item to start food prep or storage. After a rinse I realized it already chipped. Did not even get a chance to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT stack securely with lids on!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a larger set of these glass and expected to LOVE them. I do NOT love them for one reason .. when they are stacked with the lids in place. I’ve had 2 mishaps with a stack of them in the refrigerator. They do NOT seat securely! when the lids are snapped on. I wish I could return them. They seal securely if lined up correctly. They store without the lids on fine but they have a big disadvantage when trying to stack them with their lids in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lblazin

customer_reviews.title: Great glassware
customer_reviews.text: switching from plastic to all glass containers. The snap shut lids are awesome. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ronald

customer_reviews.title: Great size variety and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: These containers are fantastic. The lips snap on very securely but are extremely easy to remove. I do wash the lids by hand b/c they are top rack dishwasher safe only but that's not a big deal for me b/c the glass can go through the dishwasher. Plus I am saving dishwashing time anyway b/c I previously stored leftovers in Tupperware that I could not heat in the microwave so would have to transfer to a different dish before heating. Now it's a 1 stop shop. Variety of sizes are great as well.
customer_reviews.author: C.Santana

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Overall poorly made product. Says it is heat resistant but it has very noticeable warping that looks like melting after a few uses. The glass chips extremely easily just by gentle stacking and the plastic lids are difficult to snap close and break easy as well. They are also a LOT smaller than the picture makes them look.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Selvidge

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, would recommend. Pieces fit nicely into one another, and rubber parts easily come out for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: I keep trying to make these work, but they just won't!
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying to make these work, but they just won't! Saying the lids are difficult to close, might be a slight understatement. While it's important for them to fit snugly to serve their purpose, these take it to a whole new level. A few of them I can get to close with some serious effort, but some of them are physically impossible to snap shut! Not a good purchase. Will not be buying again. Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Can be used in microwave without changing shape.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these glass storage containers. Much easier to see the left overs! My hubby uses them for his lunches. He is happy that there is no red stain from tomato base foods and the glass dish does not change shape in microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Go Pyrex before you purchase these
customer_reviews.text: The lids are so difficult to get on the containers (almost like they don't fit properly), not to mention the fact that the rubber pieces inside the lid continuously fall out. Would not purchase again. Very dissatisfied. Additionally, one of my glass containers already has a chip on it's lip.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality so far!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put these through all their paces yet, but so far so good! The glass is high quality and the seal is superb. I wish these stacked together a bit more efficiently but otherwise I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KyraTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: These containers are very airtight. Quick tip: snap the long edges down first and then the short edges. They stack nicely and keep food stored very well. Easy to microwave leftovers. I'm looking forward to checking freezer storage next. With the nice airtight seal I've witnessed so far, I'm anticipating good freezer results. Highly recommend. I'm going to see if I can find these in slightly larger sizes as well. I want more!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking into switching to glass Tupperware for a while. I have only had these for a short time but love them. The sizes are perfect. The container seal great and they are not as heavy as I thought they would be. I have washed them in the dishwasher and used in the microwave with no issues. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These containers seal tight and keep foods fresh longer. They clean up with just a wipe. This package had all the different sizes we wanted, except for a super large, which wouldn’t really make sense in this set. We even take the larger ones for restaurant left overs. One tip. The seals are tight! It is easiest to close them by closing opposite sides together. Actually quite easy when done that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUCH Happier Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these containers. Thicker, more durable, and not at all flimsy. I got tired of heating up leftovers, only to have the containers become orange colored. Especially when heating tomato based dishes. It really made me feel suspicious of the integrity of those BPA free containers. Not a problem with these dishes. I like these so much, I may order another set for my motorhome. Yes, the "plastic" ones are lighter. I am willing to sacrifice the little added weight for the added safety for my family. Well worth every cent. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Quality glass food containers of every size
customer_reviews.text: These containers are excellent!! One of the things I love about them is that I can fill them all the way to the top and it won’t spill out when I put the lid on. There are a variety of sizes included and I use these every day. I only wish they were etched on the bottom with the volume that each bowl can hold. But in any case they are worth every penny. Glass containers don’t discolor in the microwave and you don’t have to worry about consuming plastic. The lids add a layer of sturdiness to the bowls and I store them in the cupboard with their lids on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Luscan

customer_reviews.title: buy anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I hate these things. I hate them so much. I don't understand how there are so many positive reviews. First, I have trouble snapping them shut. I cannot snap all four things down. I've tried on different containers. I definitely have the correct lid. I just can't do it. Then after someone else shuts them I cannot for the life of me get them off. While I am trying to get the lid on the blue silicone bit comes off and has to be stuck back into the groove. I hate these containers. The glass rubbermaid ones are better. Their lids are simple...
customer_reviews.author: ExampleName

customer_reviews.title: Another lightning deal worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a wedding gift, loved the look of them, so thought I would order myself some!! I waited till they were on lightning deal and purchased a pair! I love them. They are great for meal prepping or saving leftovers for the husband when he works late. They are durable and clean easy, not like the plastic ones! Also they make me a feel a tad bit responsible because I keep up with them!! A great buy, I also used these to make egg frittata in the microwave, cup cake, and rice!! Great product to have, want to buy more for the camper!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: These seal very, very well.
customer_reviews.text: These seal very, very well. They're perfect for lunches. Glass is so much easier to clean, and it's longer-lasting and can be put in the oven, microwave, or dishwasher. All of the sizes are useful.
customer_reviews.author: Capnmcorn

customer_reviews.title: Snaps on Lids do not work
customer_reviews.text: Most of the lids either will not snap on at all or only one or two of the four snaps will work. They have all made their way into the trash can now, learn from my experience and don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love them thanks 👍
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them for food it keeps them fresher than ziploc bags glass ones freg only
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal with 2 flaws...
customer_reviews.text: Glass containers are high quality. Various sizes are useful for storing different items. The lids are a little clunky but seal well. Two issues. One of the plastic tabs that lock the lid broke off already so only three sides work. Make sure the lid is aligned perfectly before snapping shut. Also, they do not nest very well and easily slide off when stacked up. Otherwise a great deal for the price.🍺
customer_reviews.author: Tony M.

customer_reviews.title: Food safe containers for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Love these containers for taking lunches or even baking in them. DW safe so we love them and goodbye to plastic food containers. To keep your lids working, always put on top wrack, let then cool then replace lid and put up for use later. The sealing ring can move on you but you can easily put it back in place then I place container upside down on the lid, snap 2 sides then other 2 sides and to date I have not had any lid failures and mine glassware are used in oven, fridge, microwave and DW but you must let inside food cool before putting up and cool before re-attaching lids from DW.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Leftover Storage Perfect for Microwave Use
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Glass containers can go into the microwave to reheat leftovers without cooking food oils and colors into plastic. Don't use the lids in the microwave. And DO follow the instructions and wash before using, definitely! Slightly con: The rubber gasket will separate from the lid and stick to the glass container if you snap the lid on while it's slightly wet. Maybe if it's completely dry as well! But it's easy enough to peel off and reseat in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: DrPat

customer_reviews.title: Glass chipped after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to get these, loved the variety and the quality seemed great. But after the first wash, glass started chipping where the lids closed and continues to do so every time I try to put the lid on so I can't use them. Even after cleaning and drying them, glass continues to chip in fine pieces. Really bummed that they didn't work out. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eating days are better cause food will stay secure
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great price. Unfortunately, updating review with sad news. As I unpacked the entire box I discovered the largest container was broken. The packaging looked so secure I just assumed all were good when I just opened the box top. Still a nice product, just bummed I don’t get an opportunity to use all containers. Check complete package right when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Seems like I received an unnormal one
customer_reviews.text: I used only two of them when I bought the set, and they are fine. But I need the largest one recently and found that it is so hard to be closed, every time I need almost 5 minutes to close the box!!! It has been such a long time since I bought so I cannot return or exchange, so I had to buy a new set...... For the rating of the set is 4 stars+, I think it could be that I was "unlucky". But I want to post my experience and recommend that people should check every single box as soon as they got the set.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes that make sense. Not like plastic storage bundles that give you a dozen miniature containers that wouldn't hold nothing but a few pennies. These are perfect size and they seal up exactly as you would expect. Added bonus is that they can go in the oven and dishwasher. And the dishwasher doesn't make the tops all deformed. Love them and will be purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Mills

customer_reviews.title: Cheap chipping garbage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 3 months ago because they were on sale. A lot of reviews said they would chip when stacked, I just guessed those people were being a little rough or dramatic. Long story short mine unfortunately started chipping too all over the edges ): just trying to get them Un-stacked is a nightmare so I can understand now why they chip. I have Pyrex and snap ware glass containers as well which I’m learning are worth paying the extra $$ rather than getting these cheap ones. Unfortunate but 3 have already gone in the trash
customer_reviews.author: R.Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great item and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The containers are working great! They are a great quality. They were put to use the same day. I did a quick hand wash and dry. The next day when pulling out some leftovers the snaps were tight and the seal was very tight as it should be. When I first received the containers I pulled them out of the box and one had broken in shipping and I was missing 2 containers. I contacted the seller and they responded within the hour and were very helpful. They sent a full replacement set the same day. I received it quickly and all items were accounted for. I highly recommend this item and this company. They were great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Great company and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, after just the first time in the dishwasher - two of the covers don't snap correctly and one of the snaps already starting to break. Don't waste your money Update: Shortly after review, seller contacted to replace/refund broken items. Pleased with customer service Update 6/2018 I was so impressed with the customer service! The company contacted me months later on their own, after already refunding me for the first set and sent me a brand new set on top of the refund. Highest rating!
customer_reviews.author: cathy kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well after a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in December of 2018 (been almost a year as I write this) these have held up wonderfully. I have had no chips or breaks of any kind. No staining or food smell in the plastic lids, no breaking of any of the tabs. Some things to know: -I don’t have a dishwasher, so I only hand wash, and when I do, I remove the blue rubber that makes the seal so that nothing gets stuck -single adult household -I have put them in the freezer, and also in the oven, and microwave. -they do occasionally go to work with me as lunch containers
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, AND customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've had something similar before, but wanted a larger set, and one of my old lids was missing a tab. The largest round bowl arrived with a small chip in the underside of the outside rim, and I contacted the seller who immediately made sure they could replace the correct piece, and sent a new one! Very convenient, as I didn't want to have to pack up and return the entire set just to address one little chip. My old set did get a over the years, but it is fairly easy to sand the edges to make re-usable. I just didn't want to start anew with a chipped set!
customer_reviews.author: E. Stefany

customer_reviews.title: Love my glass Storage containers!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Nice, secure fitting lids. It's so easy to know what is being stored in the bowls. I have not used them in the freezer. I have only used them in the microwave and refrigerator. We have used every single bowl at one time or another! It's great to have different sizes to accommodate different portions. I would like to get a couple of even larger sizes if I can find them! This glass won't crack as my plastic containers did (unless I happen to drop!). An interlocking system between the bottom of a container and the lid of another, so they would stack more securely, would be REALLY NICE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for product I could freeze food in as well as store in refrigerator and cook. These fit the bill. Covers offer a tight secure seal. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically Functional and Formal
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability, clean and elegant design, and especially the snap-on/pop-off lids EASY for my arthritic hands to use. My only extra time initially was figuring out the best configuration to store it in the cabinet (all the pieces are hardly ever there) and in learning to seat the lids centered properly in two directions to snap on correctly. DEFINITELY AN UPGRADE FROM THE RUBBER/PLASTIC THAT IS NOW IN THE CLOSET TO PACKAGE "TO-GO" BOXES FOR FRIENDS AND FAMILY!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ruff

customer_reviews.title: A lovely glass set in my concrete apt
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of glass.. it can be easily broken and be a messy clean up! However these are beautiful. They are heavy and sturdy. I’ve microwaved them A few times, and had no issues. I really like the fact that they are heavy weighted. I have yet to use them in the oven. I’ve ran them through the dishwasher a few times, and had no problems. Definitely recommend to anyone who is a starter to glass storage ware like I am.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Daphney Walker

customer_reviews.title: Chipped within a month under normal use
customer_reviews.text: Glass is thin and cheap, it chips very easily with normal use. Careful to check for glass shards before putting food inside or you will end up eating glass like I did. Chipped within the first month of use. I continued to use them cautiously for a year and a half before becoming too dangerous and throwing them away. Lids did create a nice tight seal but only after trying to get the exact right combination for the locks to work. Won’t be buying again nor recommending.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with the New & Improved!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for everything, but I’m sad that the blue rubber isn’t staying on the lids at all. We are avoiding washing them in dishwasher so they don’t get worse. Kinda bummed. UPDATE 6/3/2018 We received the new and improved 1790 Glass Container Set & the modifications made by the manufacturer were a home run! The lids fit tightly and evenly on the containers that using them is a snap. They are so well made. Completely air tight and leak proof. Very impressed with how quickly the issue was addressed and resolved. 5 Star product! If you’re looking for versatile containers that deliver..... look no further. They are right here.
customer_reviews.author: Prime for Life

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and they stand behind their guarantees!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but customer service is fantastic! I accidentally dropped my container which absolutely shattered one and chipped another. I filled out the form on the manufacturers website asking about their lifetime guarentee. They responded within the hour (at 10:30 pm on a Sunday night) and asked about which sizes to replace. Replacements came for free 4 business days later in perfect condition. Love love love this company and their products. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cira

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I hate plastic and have been slowly removing it from my world as much as possible. I was so glad to see this 18 piece glassware set with such varying sizes for different left overs or storing options that I couldn't pass it up. The food stays much fresher, you can microwave your left overs right in the container without the worry of plastic melting into your food and clean up is a breeze. A definite MUST HAVE for all!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these storage containers for awhile now and love them. They store beautifully in my cabinets and I've never had an issue with leakage (super strong clasps!). I recently had an issue with 2 of the bowls and contacted customer service. Jolyn e-mailed me back within a few hours, and within a few days I had replacement bowls. Love that this company really stands behind their fabulous products. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price but quality is not quite dependent
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get this order promptly. I wanted to give this 3 or 4 star because of the quantity and the actual glass & plastic lid are very sturdy. However, I have to give this a 2 star because every time I open these, the lids do not come off quickly. The rubber liner that sticks the lid to the glass comes off. So, you really have to take time to open these, realign the rubber liner, before you can close them. I would return but I just do not want to deal with the hassle. It would cost me more to return than the actual price
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T. Tautai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are such great dishes! I don’t eat a lot so they are perfect for single serving cooking and storage. Love the way the lids clip in place, making a very good seal to keep the food fresh. Baking and cleaning are so easy, just the way I like things, nice and easy. Would recommend this set to anyone looking for a set of small versatile baking/storage options!
customer_reviews.author: MauraLJ

customer_reviews.title: BS customer service support
customer_reviews.text: I hate how the tabs break off and the product becomes useless. I actually was going to get lids but a ‘Customer Service representative’ we didn’t sell them and just to give a purchase number. Apparently the ‘service rep’ didn’t like my choice of said purchase number and decided to give me flack and never send me anything. He apparently thought he knew the number the whole time, but I gave hum the correct purchase order number for the glass products I was talking about. I had bought a few. I also stated to the representative that if they wanted to send me some covers for the number they had fine- nothing and it’s a half a year later.
customer_reviews.author: jmho

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This set was a great assortment,but I have already had it chip in three places on one of them that resulted in it chipping into my food I prepared. I only really found out that it had chipped when I found two pieces in my mouth. Luckily I did feel them, I found the one dish that chipped and also found out that there was actually 3 pieces chipped on it... I only found 2 pieces. So , evdentIy I swallowed one. I will not give a good rating for this product because I haven't had them very long and this happened , where as I have bought pyrex years ago and never had any kind of problems like this.
customer_reviews.author: spanish G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible horrible hooorrible product!
customer_reviews.text: I am waaaaay past pissed that I completely wasted my money and the return window has just closed! Literally beyond livid! I kept trying to give it a try but this product is horrible even while completely EMPTY I can not close the damn thing! Like wth?!? It shouldn’t be that hard and frustrating to close something that’s meant to close now I have to look for a whole new case to reorder AGAIN! Whaaaat a waste of money! I suggest you do not waste your damn time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Responsive customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 6/17/18: I was pleasantly surprised when the manufacturer offered to supply me with a new and improved set. The new dishes didn’t have any chemical smell I encountered with the first set and I am now a happy customer. Their customer service was also incredibly kind and responsive. Sh!t happens with manufacturing all the time, but at least this company fixed the issue and made things right. ORIGINAL REVIEW: I've bought glass containers before and have never had an issue with lids having a chemical/plastic smell, but these are flipping atrocious. Even after washing them they have noxious smell. I may have to throw these out it's so disgusting. I DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed new glass containers for my prep dishes and those are just perfect! I like them more than Pyrex brand mostly because their lids are just better quality. My pyrex ones didn't like the dishwasher and overtime the lids have split. The glass material is very thick and durable. Shapes of the containers are really nice and versatile too. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: great storage
customer_reviews.text: These containers are leak proof, and size variety is tremendous for storage /reheating and organization The glass bottoms give them a versatility that works for fridge /microwave and oven - I haven't tried the freezer yet but the instructions indicate this is possible.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great product and awesome alternative to plastic containers!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic storage set. Wanted to get rid of plastic Tupperware and this was the perfect replacement. The lids are NOT microwave safe, but I never put plastic containers in the microwave in the first place, so being able to use the containers in the microwave is a big step up. Some complained about how the lids lock, but I did not have an issue with that. In fact the lids form a very tight seal, although worried how long they will last. Either awesome product and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and durability
customer_reviews.text: I have a small insulated heating plate that I use at work. These glass bowls are the perfect sizes for single serving meals that I heat right at my desk. I just may buy a 2nd set and trash my plastic storage bowls for good!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brown

customer_reviews.title: The glass chips easily
customer_reviews.text: I was initially happy with these containers. However, the glass is extremely fragile. Worse, when it chips, it can chip into tiny fragments from only a minor impact, if the impact is at the right angle. I found a tiny sliver of glass inside one of the containers when I was about to put food in it. I don't even recall hitting it, but maybe when I was stacking them? Regardless, tiny pieces of glass on the floor or on the countertop or inside the container aren't a risk I am willing to take. I am giving these one star only because of the brittleness of the glass. (All of the other features are very good.) But, safety first.
customer_reviews.author: UYV Comments

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be fine to me
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be fine to me. I was worried after I had ordered them after seeing the pictures of them breaking in the oven or microwave. I wonder if maybe they were placed in thr microwave right from the refrigerator? If so then of coruse they will shatter. But Im hoping these will hold up! Ill write a new review if they do not hold up. The reason i have it 4 stars and not 5 is because the lids seem to be a little stiff and harder to get on but once they are used more i think it will break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lids can be a pain to snap on
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can complain about is the fact that sometimes, if the lid is not aligned perfectly, it is impossible to snap all four clips onto the glass container. To fix the issue you have to unsnap and realign the lid. It may just be me (operator error) but it happens to me about 70% of the time. Other than that, good quality containers! Never had a problem with leaks and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M0M@Duk

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: No negatives as of yet. I love the product so much that I purchased 3 sets. They're made of thick sturdy glass and good quality, snap on lids with good seals all around making a good connection to glass containers. Will recommend this product to a friend who is looking at purchasing them as well.
customer_reviews.author: MAMACATS

customer_reviews.title: Bye, bye plastic containers!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the flaps on the lids are a little hard to close, but I am guessing that has more to do with the fact that they are new more than anything else. Overall, this is a good, quality set at a great price. Durable in oven and microwave and washes up easily. No staining, bubbles or potential melting issues like plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: EPFrank

customer_reviews.title: Favorite way to store leftovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so we could start phasing out plastic storage containers, and I'm so glad I did. these containers are so sleek. the tops seal so well that sometimes I have a hard time getting them off, almost as if they've vacuumed sealed. my only complaint is that you have to perfectly center the lids to get the flaps down, but it's really not that big of an issue. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Band of Idiots Designed this Set?
customer_reviews.text: OK, so the glass bottoms are fine, but the lids! They are beyond awful. You have to set the lids on the glass bottoms just right to get them to close. What a time suck. Even when you finally get the lids to work, the flaps may pop up. Argh! I made such a mistake buying this set.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Seal rings stick and break easily.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can not recommend these. They do their job but every time you open them the rubber seal ring sticks to the glass and comes out of the lid. Then you have to very carefully try to peel it off and they will still probably break anyway. I’ve had them for a couple weeks now and half of them are now not usable since the seals broke. Honestly, I should have paid better attention to other reviews that had this same problem. If you are a SAMs club member there is a very similar set for sale there for less and the seal rings are glued into place and made of a different non sticking material.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading “18” piece set!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read a little closer and counted the actual dishes in the photo - its a NINE piece set unless you count the lids - which you can’t store food in. They might as well call it a 27 piece set because of the nine lid seals, which is realistically another “piece”. The quality is average along with price when you discover how many actual storage containers are sold. So, read the entire description and count the dishes in the photo..
customer_reviews.author: Davy J

customer_reviews.title: They came in good condition ( no chips like other reviews that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at these for a while. I decided to try them. They came in good condition ( no chips like other reviews that I had read). I washed them in the dishwasher top rack prior to using them. They were very difficult to close after washing. I was tempted to send them back , but tried the next day to close them and they seem to close easier. Not sure why maybe they needed to cool down or something. I am going to keep them with the hope that they will become easier to open with use. They are a good variety of sizes for the storage I need.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for glass storage bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Love the snap lock lid. Sizes are great as well. I washed in the dishwasher and they held up fine! I used in the micro and they warned food with out making the bowl extremely hot. I would recommend purchase if your looking for glass storage bowls.
customer_reviews.author: sams mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I’ll never go back to plastic again. Freeze, heat and serve ready. Sturdy work/travel containers. No leaks even when on it’s side in packed travel cooler. Two of these sizes fit into my travel stove perfectly. I can take it directly from the cooler or freezer and put inside my travel stove. Easy clean up, less clutter. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great glass, great customer service, awful awful lids
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like these. The sellers are super nice and were very helpful when we had a broken lid. However, these lids are extremely hard to clip on. It seems like you have to use two hands to push and if you don’t get both down at the same time, you’re screwed. The glass seems like good quality, but these lids are awful. They’re also kind of hard to clean, easy to crack, and just difficult altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Katie and Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with both this product and their customer service. One of the containers arrived broken and as soon as I filed a claim they responded quickly, had me pick the correct size of the one that was broken, and are already sending a new one for me. I have already used this to meal prep for the week without any issues. They all fit in the dishwasher and worked great in the microwave!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kae

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: We got these to replace the odds & ends assortment of Tupperware we still had after several years. These really are great food storage containers and we feel really good about the fact that the base is not plastic. The top is, but not flimsy, and they snap on very nicely. Plus, they stack really well in the refrigerator. We're very pleased with them and may get another set :-)
customer_reviews.author: cornis00

customer_reviews.title: definitely not a deal breaker as we do love these containers
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar set a few years ago at Bed, Bath and Beyond for more money with less containers. We have already used all the pieces several times and were able to get rid of most of our plastic containers. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating is that you have to put the lids on just right to get them to click into place.... definitely not a deal breaker as we do love these containers. We will probably buy a second set and get rid of the rest of our plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney M Payne

customer_reviews.title: Lids do not lock down as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The glass is heavy duty, very easy to clean and durable. The lids however are a huge disappointment. Several of the lids do not lock down and are pretty much useless. I bought these so my lunch could travel well to and from work but on more than one occasion leaked in my leather tote. The lids on a couple pieces lock down but not the entire set. I’m very disappointed and wish I had not purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Deezigns

customer_reviews.title: Great bases, need a cover code.
customer_reviews.text: I love glass food storage dishes instead of plastic and these are great. They are substantial and have really good, well rounded edges. I gave them four stars because the tops only fit one way and it would be good to have a small mark on them to designate the upper right hand corner for instance. Perhaps a small dot or the letters UR so that we wouldn't have to be trying different ways to make the lids fit better. Once you find the right way to cover the dish, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kingsley Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great containers, the cap however...
customer_reviews.text: Great glass based meal containers. The caps are plastic, and the air seal is a rubber-like material. Works as intended, however the seal part can be separated from the cap and has a tendency to adhere more onto to the glass over the cap. If this happens, be careful when separating the seal and container, as it can cause the air seal to rip a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Be very gentle
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved them but then one was chipped only a week after purchase while putting dishes away. It wasn't dropped or harshly treated, it simply bummed another piece. I have many other glass dishes that are not nearly as fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Why use product with BPA when these exist
customer_reviews.text: Great substitute to potentially harmful BPA containing plastic options. These glass containers work well and are a healthier option to store and warm up food. Also potentially reduces our harmful environmental waste by using easily recyclable, sustainable glass vs plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Held up well! Surpased their value.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary after reading reviews of broken lids, lids not sealing, etc... But these have held up to normal use and dishwashing for us! I figured I'd take a chance for the price and these have exceeded my expectations! My wife takes them to work daily and they've held up to leaks and freshness. VERY HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: From Freezer to Oven safe!
customer_reviews.text: This product is durable and easy to clean. I love that it's BPA free and oven, microwave, freezer, and dishwasher safe. It's air tight and I haven't had anything leak even when putting liquid in. For the price you get, they're great storage containers with versatility in different temperatures. I got this for my boyfriend and will probably buy more for myself if I needed glass containers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Update.... although the quality is good the lids are very difficult to put on. They must be exactly in the right position or they will not lock down. It’s frustrating to have to mess with putting the lids exactly so so or the lid will not lock on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: They’re as advertised. The glass is nice and thick, and the lids hold on tight. However, I obviously didn’t pay close enough attention. They are much smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I’m not sure how these have such good reviews. The covers are impossibly hard to clamp down on the glass containers. I thought maybe with some time they would loosen and be easier. It defeats the point of a container if you can only clamp two sides down. I have had multiple lunches spilled because my hands hurt and I gave up on trying to clamp all sides of the lid. It shouldn’t be that hard. I will be throwing these away.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Prellwitz

customer_reviews.title: Glass chips and lids won't snap shut
customer_reviews.text: Initially I had a problem snapping some of the lids, which was annoying but not dangerous. Recently almost all of the corners and edges of the glass on these containers is chipping. I have found pieces of glass in my drawer and in the containers themselves. I am very careful with these containers and there is no reason for the to chip other other than poor quality (for example I have some snapware glass containers which I have used for longer and they do not chip). These are dangerous and poorly made. I am throwing mine away. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls. They lock tight and are heavy. Only thing they didn't have the grey lids at the ti.e but the blue is just as beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Seal is leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Convenient to use and clean. Glass is so much more durable than plastic. The glass was heavy and not easy to chip or break. The lids really are leakproof and seal so well that I am not concerned about leakage if they get tipped in a lunchbox or the refrigerator. Also like the fact that the contents of the container are clearly visible and leftovers down become throw-outs.
customer_reviews.author: Surprised

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the $$.
customer_reviews.text: I have switched all my food storage containers to glass. I wasn't expect the quality with the price I paid. The glass is quite thick. I am very impressed. They were extremely well packaged and nest easily together. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kylaandres

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with purchase...Rubber seals stuck to glass containers
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was in very good condition, I was pleased with the loo of products until I started opening the lids and the funny thing is all the rubber seals were stuck to the glass containers and not staying in the grooves of the lids 🤔🤨 if this is the norm then it’s not what I want......I am returning them...NOT PLEASED WITH PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: JaneO.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The rubber plastic does not stick to the glass, I would take the lid off and the rubber would peel off, I don't recommend this product, go to Costco and demonstrate first before buying
customer_reviews.author: peach

customer_reviews.title: The gasket is junk, go elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would save a buck and buy these and they looked like decent lids. Unfortunately this company had to cut costs somewhere and they did it in the gaskets of the lids, which I'm home is the worst spot to cheap out. Once the gasket is torn the lid doesn't fit tight. And the gasket is so soft it glued to the glass. This happen literally opening the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Perez

customer_reviews.title: I feel fancy with these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Rid my cupboard space of all my old, cracked, misfit Tupperware containers/lids. These stack for storage, freeze, and pack lunches so well! I can microwave in them w/out melting plastic. They clean like a dream, don’t stain, and can be dried in the dishwasher. I love them. Really nice to have a tidy food storage cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: Not shatterproof, not safe
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally knocked one off the countertop onto hardwood flooring. It completely shattered, hundreds of tiny glass shards flying everywhere. Took forever to clean up. Properly tempered glass should not do this. It’s not safe and I would use this product where it may be subject to mechanical shock and/or large temperature changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ling-Nan Zou

customer_reviews.title: Chips very easily, cumbersome to store properly
customer_reviews.text: Leak proof as it says but the type of glass chips very easily and cannot be stacked unless you put lids on and then have to figure out configuration of which one fits in the other one In an effort to take up less space when storing
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B

customer_reviews.title: Thick glass
customer_reviews.text: Great thick quality of glass..very impressed and worth the money! Love my plastic snap on storage containers but switched to glass ..best decision I've made. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bowls for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bowls. They seal really well. Just make sure the food you are storing is cool before putting the lid on it and putting it in the fridge. I cook fresh chicken for my babies (dogs) and put the hot chicken and some hot broth in the bowl and put it in the fridge. The next morning I almost could not get the lid off. The rubber seal around the top of the lid sealed the bowl really tight. Which is great. Just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Toni House

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic! stop searching! these are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over amazon for the best storage containers, and this one was the best. When I first opened the box I couldn't believe how stackable they were, and that the glass was in perfect condition. No smell, oven safe, microwave safe, dishwasher safe, no spill, and no leaks! Storage is finally simple and easy!
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, well made glass containers. The only negative would be how hard they can be to close. I can often close two to three sides but then the last one is tough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids don’t fit
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these glass containers but then I am very disappointed that the lids don’t fit on the container. The tops sit on the container but cannot be closed. I even asked my son to try and lock them for me and maybe one side will lock but then the other sides won’t. Not worth the money and cannot use .
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Glass is heavier than plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! Just something to be aware of, glass is heavier than plastic. So, if you plan on using several containers at once, you may be surprised at the difference in weight. Otherwise, the products are easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.author: mbrown

customer_reviews.title: Worst I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be so great but they are terrible! They are very hard to close with the snap things and I put some spaghetti sauce in the large container for a week and a half and it already had freezer burn on it. Going to pack them up and give them all to Goodwill !
customer_reviews.author: Sharon333

product_meta.title: 1790 Glass Food Storage Containers with Lids, Glass Meal Prep Containers, Airtight Glass Lunch Boxes, BPA-Free, Approved & Leak Proof (18 Piece - 9PK) Up to 1040℉
feature_bullets: 18 PIECE SET - This food storage container set includes 9 glass containers of varying sizes and 9 matching lids. This is the perfect solution to store all of your prepared meals, snacks, and leftovers.

100% BPA FREE AND APPROVED - 1790 Leftover Food Containers are 100% Approved and BPA Free, and made out of borosilicate glass for easy heating and durability. They're a great size for meal prepping and leftovers for the whole family!

OVEN,MICROWAVE,FREEZER,DISHWASHER SAFE - 1790 Glass Containers are heat resistant up to 1040℉ (the only one in the market). They're stain and odor resistant too - The lids are not oven safe, please remove the lids before heating up. Clean the glass containers and lids easy in the Dishwasher and keep your food or leftovers quietly in the freezer. (-40℉)
NESTING DESIGN - Gone are the days that you have to worry about stacking precarious piles of plastic in your kitchen cupboards as this set was designed with nesting mind.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE If for any reason, you arent happy with your Glass Freezer Containers with Lids, just send them back to us for a prompt and full refund. We want to help you make life easy and keep you and your family fed by storing and preserving the meals and leftovers you prepare so they can be ready at a moments notice.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,788 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
